name: Solar System project (antonsutherland)
description:
This mini-project shows a simplified model of the solar system. Clicking on a planet will change the perspective.

Modifications:

-added all missing planets,  including material, behavior, and audio:

* Mercury

* Venus

* Mars

* Jupiter

* Saturn

* Neptun

* Uranus

* Pluto (debatable if a planet, but I added it anyways)

-adjustment of the main camera;

-adjustment of sound volume.

Created by: A. Malarev
